location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 7 to William Digges Latouche and George Abraham, Councils at Bussora [Basra], from John Beaumont at Bushire

mods.abstract: A short letter that explains the events noted in John Beaumont and George Green's letter of 12 July 1778 (item IOR/R/15/1/3, pp 1-2) to colleagues in Bussora [Basra] and states that Francis M. Henry and Daniel Fitzgerald Griffin travelled to Bombay onboard the BetsySnow (under command of Lieutenant Brice Hardy). Shipped by Saffir's boat express.
